title: Marina Cove has everything you need here!
posting_body: Visit us at Marina Cove and let us show you how apartment living should be!
You'll have a wonderful home equipped with stainless steel kitchen appliances and such beautiful aesthetics that you'll never want to move anywhere else 📦
📃 Lease apartment 1b 1ba apartment #207 for an 12month lease term
First floor || Quartz Counter tops || Washer and dryer included
Each of our garden-style apartment homes for rent is finished in modern style with quartz countertops, a combination of hardwood-style vinyl flooring and carpet, and sleek, streamlined finishes.
Additional conveniences include air conditioning, spacious storage closets, a washer and dryer, and your own private patio or balcony to enjoy the fresh air.
With 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans in a variety of layouts, we’re sure to have the right one for you.
And pet lovers can rejoice - dogs and cats are welcome at our pet-friendly apartments 🐾
